comments.comment: Congrats Andy and team - looking forward to the result!
Will any of the team be attending GDC to be able to demo it in-person?
We will be at ComicCon London and PAX East Boston to show the demo and progress in person.
I love this idea - I had visions many years ago of a TV programme called "What Not to Play" which looked at people's game libraries and recommended them new games. This could be a first step!
Any insight on a dedicated mobile app? Is the current design able to be wrapped up into native format for iOS or Android? Tentative milestone or stretch goal plans?

Thanks for the question! That is possible, although it would take time and resources away from adding functionality and finesse to the experience. It's on the roadmap but we are prioritising the web-app experience to be as good as it can be. If we overfund then a dedicated app will certainly move up the priorities.
Just responding here to second this! A mobile app would be fantastic. I hope it can overfund enough to move it up the list (:
I've just realised it's a web app.
I really hope a mobile app is developed at some point.
I use Firefox Focus as a browser, and it would be awkward to have to log in every time I use the web app.
Thanks Julia - sorry for the delayed response. Kickstarting makes you busy!
